alert.note: Alert for Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:18PM EDT until July 20 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Wert County in west central Ohio... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 618 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Convoy, or near Van Wert, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Van Wert, Delphos, Convoy, Ohio City, Middlebury, Middle Point, Scott, Wren, Venedocia, Elgin, Wetzel, Monticello, Glenmore, Cavett, Dull, Abanaka, Jonestown, and Schumm. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
